title: Recipes
subtitle: Try our signature dishes at home.

recipes.title: Classic Caesar Salad
recipes.excerpt: A timeless recipe with crisp romaine and homemade dressing.
recipes.body: Combine romaine lettuce, parmesan, and croutons. Add our house Caesar dressing and toss gently. Serve immediately.

recipes.title: Herb-Crusted Salmon
recipes.excerpt: Pan-seared salmon with a fresh herb crust.
recipes.body: Coat salmon fillets with a mixture of breadcrumbs, parsley, dill, and lemon zest. Pan-sear until golden. Serve with seasonal vegetables.

recipes.title: Homemade Tiramisu
recipes.excerpt: The perfect balance of coffee, mascarpone, and cocoa.
recipes.body: Layer espresso-soaked ladyfingers with whipped mascarpone cream. Dust with cocoa powder. Chill for at least 4 hours before serving.
